body:
Hi all,
I´m new to this forum but I started using Open Studio integrated with the new Radiance features. I 
found the possibility to run a whole-building energy performance according to the daylighting and 
electric lighting control response based on Radiance-calculated daylight distributions very
interesting.


I´m not so confident with the Radiance functionality, I´ve only installed the Radiance binaries 
downloaded from the NREL OpenStudio website.
I closely followed the tutorial and I was able to run the ModelToRad.rb and the DaylightSim.rb 
with --dc option. Next, running –dcts option, a microsoft error message dealing with gendaylit.exe 
appears. The calculation begins (just like in your video) but for each new day this error turns 
up.


I will be very grateful for any kind of advice!


Silvia












arch. Silvia Cammarano
PhD student in "Energetics"
Energy Department


Politecnico di Torino, Corso Duca degli Abruzzi, 24
